<mxCell id="En7tFPvFxG5Sfq1-i76z-55" value="payloadDisarmPipe" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];" vertex="1" connectable="0" value="signal<br>sends<br>'True'<br>or a value" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="245" y="620" width="80" height="70" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="En7tFPvFxG5Sfq1-i76z-57" value="observer returns 'True' on success, 'None' if unsupported." style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=11;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="90" y="530" width="110" height="55" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="En7tFPvFxG5Sfq1-i76z-58" value="Optional, allows signal to potentially <br style="font-size: 10px;">interrupt payload in progress if supported&nbsp;<br style="font-size: 10px;">by payload" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;fontSize=10;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="535" y="656" width="210" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="En7tFPvFxG5Sfq1-i76z-59" value="signal: Sends 'True'" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;fontSize=10;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="509" y="616" width="110" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="En7tFPvFxG5Sfq1-i76z-60" value="returns 'True' if payload <br>stopped,or None <br>(if unsupported)" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;fontSize=10;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="655" y="520" width="130" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="En7tFPvFxG5Sfq1-i76z-61" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;exitX=0.5;exitY=0;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=1;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="En7tFPvFxG5Sfq1-i76z-52" target="En7tFPvFxG5Sfq1-i76z-14"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="589" y="350" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="639" y="300" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="En7tFPvFxG5Sfq1-i76z-62" value="dmsClass.payloadStatePipe" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];" vertex="1" connectable="0" parent="En7tFPvFxG5Sfq1-i76z-61"> <mxGeometry x="0.1491" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="22" as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="En7tFPvFxG5Sfq1-i76z-63" value="Sends True or Exception, depending on success/failure" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="610" y="250" width="60" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="En7tFPvFxG5Sfq1-i76z-65" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=1;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;startArrow=none;startFill=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="En7tFPvFxG5Sfq1-i76z-20" target="En7tFPvFxG5Sfq1-i76z-53"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="70" y="470" /> <mxPoint x="70" y="740" /> <mxPoint x="790" y="740" /> <mxPoint x="790" y="460" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="En7tFPvFxG5Sfq1-i76z-68" value="payloadActivationPipe" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];" vertex="1" connectable="0" parent="En7tFPvFxG5Sfq1-i76z-65"> <mxGeometry x="-0.0492" y="2" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="En7tFPvFxG5Sfq1-i76z-69" value="one-way pipe via which payload is triggered" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="280" y="740" width="260" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="En7tFPvFxG5Sfq1-i76z-71" value="'True' is sent by observer&nbsp;" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="369" y="770" width="90" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="En7tFPvFxG5Sfq1-i76z-73" value="Will also send 'True' on signal disarm" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="690" y="260" width="60" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 448px; height: 1px; padding-top: 125px; margin-left: 181px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.pre:
"dms.py" - CLI utility to 'launch' a DMS instance, fire-and-forget
User provides arguments for each function loaded

switch.text: "dms.py" - CLI utility to 'launch' a DMS instance, fire-and-forget...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 548px; height: 1px; padding-top: 30px; margin-left: 131px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
User creates their own 'observer', 'signal' (optional) and 'payload' functions via the Python interpreter and uses pickle/shelve to dump them to disk.
(prefer shelve if we want to 'sign' functions, assuming person loading dms.py doesn't write the funcs)

switch.text: User creates their own 'observer', 'signal' (optional) and 'payload' functions via the Pyth...

div.div:
multiprocessing.Process
'Brains' coupling all three together, has one way pipes with all three to log errors.
Distributes any 'communications' pipes between subprocesses when starting them and handles Exceptions accordingly

div.div:
multiProcessing.process, derived from provided observer function obj and relevant args
Has bidirectional pipe for 'reset' communications with signal, one-way pipe for 'trigger' signal to dmsClass

div.div:
multiProcessing.process, from signal function provided.
Bidirectional pipe for 'reset' communications
intended as the 'user interface' to any modifications while running
